name: Trouble in Procedural Planet (demo)
description:
-CODE 404- Anomaly found in planet  Chronos-PP13. Multiple realities collapsing terrain shapeshifting again. We need to stop this before it expands to other planets!

Mission: Eliminate all robots causing malfunctions in the region

Controls:

WASD ==> movement

Mouse ==> aim / shoot

MouseWheel ==> switch weapons

Space==> jump

Shift ==> run

C==> crouch
